snippet: Less than one week after the program made its debut for annual members in New York, riders were able to buy daily or weekly passes, in turn opening the system en masse.
abstract: New York City's bike share program enters new phase in which customers can purchase daily or weekly passes, opening system en masse to tourists for first time; wide-scale opening presents crucial early test for proponents and critics alike.
lead_paragraph: Less than one week after the program made its debut for annual members in New York, riders were able to buy daily or weekly passes, in turn opening the system en masse.

headline.seo: New Test for Bike Sharing Is Tourists on City Streets
headline.main: New Test for Bike Sharing: Tourists on City Streets
headline.print_headline: New Test for Bike Sharing: Tourists on City Streets
